name: Field Duty
tooltip:
Field DutyLevel 60

Report for duty at the Ironforge Brigade post near Hive'Zora.  Prepare your Unsigned Field Duty Papers and obtain Signed Field Duty Papers from Captain Blackanvil and return to Windcaller Kaldon at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.

Note: Healing or casting beneficial spells on a member of the Ironforge Brigade will flag you for PvP.

Requirements:
- Signed Field Duty Papers
